comments:

The java file is created, and the class generated, but the templates are missing. 
Testing shows that even trivial templates cause this error (ie. /** */).

Claude, please investigate. It seems to fail with even simply templates so we 
should fix this for the next integration build.

Scott,

Which build are you using?
Can you post the 'typecomment' and 'filecomment' templates which are causing 
this? Is this bug different from 15247? Please reopen if you that's the case.

I'm using build I0827 (mentioned in the summary).

This is not related to bug 15247. I am able to 
reproduce it using either the filecomment and/or the typecomment, using any simple 
template.
ie: filecomment = //test

Ok, I think I figured out the problem. You probably changed the context of 
these templates from Java to JavaDoc. A recent change I made to templates 
exposed this problem. Will work on a solution for this. For now, please reset 
the context type to Java.
